actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Interior to revise the boundary of Everglades National Park in the State of Florida, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to revise the common boundary between Everglades National Park and Big Cypress National Preserve in Florida to include a specified trail within the Preserve.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Interior to revise the boundary of Everglades National Park in the State of Florida, and for other purposes.
